feed.title: DocuSeal Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 1.6.1
entry.content: 🆕 Prefill signatures 🆕 Double click on the builder text field to add default value 🆕 Add field validation options 🐞 Fix email click tracking param

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 1.6.2
entry.content: 🆕 Add completed notification email to template preferences 🛠 Use persistent async jobs backend 🛠 Use latest Alpine image

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 1.6.3
entry.content: 🆕 Automatically add PDF form fields 🆕 Allow to copy and paste fields 🆕 Double click date field to toggle signing date

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 1.6.4
entry.content: 🆕 Add document form preview feature 🛠 Allow to move and resize fields with arrow keys 🐞 Fix cells field font size

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 1.6.5
entry.content: 🛠 Allow to disable document attachments in the completed notification email 🛠 Allow to permanently remove submissions
